; >>> ADMIN_ACCESS_DENIED
;

;
; >>> ATTACHEMENTS_DENIED
;
WikiErrorCodes.ATTACHEMENTS_DENIED=With current configuration, Guest user can't update attachements.
;
; >>> INVALID_PAGE_NAME
;
WikiErrorCodes.INVALID_PAGE_NAME='<b>{0}</b>' is not a Wiki page. Please try another wiki name or extent search to full text.<br><br><br><a href=WikiSearch.aspx?str={0}>To try full text search on '<b>{0}</b> : click here! </a><br><br>If you want to create this page : <a href=WikiEdit.aspx?page={0}>click here</a>
;
; >>> MISSING_PAGE_NAME
;

;
; >>> PAGE_ACCESS_DENIED
;

; >>> SQL_STORAGE_REQUIRED
;

; >>> STORAGE_ACCESS_ERROR
